Design-01.Description: Design Style 01 is a Solid graphic style. Custom Text or Custom Logo (red 'CUSTOM TEXT / LOGO' in image) can be added and either cut out of the main stripe, or it can be an alternate color than the main stripe.

Design-02.Description: Design Style 02 is a Solid stripe with a single upper / outer pinstripe style. The upper / outer pinstripe accent (red in image) can be the same, or different color to the main stripe. Custom Text or Custom Logo (blue 'CUSTOM TEXT / LOGO' in image) can be added and either cut out of the main stripe, or it can be an alternate color than the main stripe.
